issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
For iOS, when you create a new mobile project in Titanium Studio and run it on device, the ipa file it generates is well over 4MB. 

That's a blank project!

The application size should not be that big. I'm not sure if this is a problem on Android but it might be.

To test it, just create a new project in titanium studio, hit run on device, and then see the size of the ipa file it generates. If you unzip the ipa file and look at the actual executable inside the .app package, the executable is over 5MB.
fields.summary: iOS: Ti should include only the used functionality into the app
fields.environment:
Titanium Mobile v1.7.5 and above. Tested up to version 1.7.6.v20111209013042
Using Titanium Studio v 1.0.6
MacPro8,3 Snow Leopard
